title: I have been unjustly Perma ban Riot please help
body: I have been perma banned for scripting whitch I havent done nor will ever do Im assuming I have been reported for scripting by somone when I was lagging and accidentally dodged a skill shot. I have spent quite the sum of money on this game and played a lot of time and think its extreemly unfair if I lose my account for somthing I havent done So please if there are any rioters here help me out please

replies.body:
Nope Don't script!

I lose LP because of scripters like you and Riot doesn't care!
how do you tell the difference between luck, a really good player, or a scripter? because i've had a friend banned for scripting, but he was actually just really good at dodging D:

You detect the non standard client/programs interfering with the packets being sent to the server. There are circumstances where such a thing may be beyond your control (internet cafes) or something may cause a false positive (having a disallowed program installed then removed but not removed properly/completely), but if someone is banned for scripting it's not just because they were really good at dodging. It's because an actual malicious program (or seemingly malicious program) was interfering with the client in some way (and/or the account was compromised and the intruder used scripts).

Terribly sorry XD I should have worded that differently.
I mean my friend got banned from people reporting him being a scripter/hacker. I don't believe he resulted in a direct ban from the system picking up on malicious activity. Or it could have just been as you said, beyond his control and resulted in looking like it even though he is a very good player.

False reports are irrelevant, people aren't banned for being reported for scripting, the report is just a flag to investigate the account, i.e if someone gets reported for scripting a lot then more than likely a Rioter will manually review the account instead of leaving it to the automatic detection. You will not be banned for scripting without your account having been involved with scripts in one way or the other.
Welp, somethings gotta give and machines can't lie x)
